title: [Custom Game Mode] Juggernaut (9v1)
body:
I get picked on by both my teammates and the enemy team in about 40% of my games, regardless of performance, due to that little black mark on my account. *(Don't ask.)* At times, I even want to turn on my teammates when they're giving me sh!t and turn the fight into a 6v4. *(Be honest, you have wanted to do this in the past.)*

As such, I would love to see a game mode where it's actually 9v1, but the solo player (chosen randomly) is deliberately overpowered. Stuff like 80% resistance to CC, 500 AR/MR, extremely high regeneration, lots of AD/AP, etc. Basically, you are supposed to be unstoppable unless your opponents are good or have a composition with lots of suppression. And even then, some Champions would be 100% impossible to beat. Balanced? No, but why would you want it to be?

Oh, how the inner sadist in me would love stomping those trolls' heads into the pavement and leaving bloody footprints in my wake...

This would only work on Howling Abyss, or perhaps a new arena that is more like a small ring with few places to hide.

Want to go troll-stomping? I do. I actually want to stomp on some of them in person, but this would suffice.

replies.body:
I don't mean to offend, but your overt enjoyment of violence (and your desire to enact RL violence) comes off as rather disturbing.

Other than that, the game mode is inherently antithetical to the teamwork that makes up the core of the game. It seems like a glorification of the toxic "I can 1v5 their whole team!" attitude that pervades the game when a carry believes themselves to be above the rest of their team. 

Why 9v1 when they can substitute that one person for a boss-like monster or Super Doom Bot?
Make it like the Halo game type, he who slays the Juggernaut, becomes the Juggernaut.

As interesting and fun as this would be....3 things.
1) Your description of other players and the violence you describe, while possibly meant to be humorous...is odd, and awkward.
2) I wont ask about the black mark...but if both teams are after you, while I cant judge, maybe you are actually doing something to cause it? Especially if its most games.

3) It would be a 1v5 to be most balanced, with more starting gold, and a higher level. Probably gain some starting effects like Tenacity and the like.
Make the Juggernaut a Doom Player.
Doom Player, but even nastier. I want to be laughing through my screen at the enemy while I turn them into a bloody smear under my boot.
